授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn about and practice for the TOEIC exam. In order to register for this course, students must meet minimum level requirements as set by the Language Center.
到達目標:
Students will be able to target an appropriate TOEIC score of 700 or higher.
Students will be able to choose statements that best describe a picture.
Students will be able to understand appropriate responses for everyday questions and statements.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
授業方法:
Individual work on test
Discuss questions with the teacher when needed

第1回:
Introduction
Overview
How to study for the TOEIC
第2回:
Practice Test 1 - listening section
Work on Chapter 1 & 2 of textbook
第4回:
Practice Test 2 - listening section
Work on Chapter 1 & 2 of textbook
第6回:
Practice Test 3 - listening section
Work on Chapter 1 & 2 of textbook
第8回:
Practice Test 4 - listening section
Work on Chapter 1 & 2 of textbook
第10回:
Practice Test 5 - listening section
Work on Chapter 1 & 2 of textbook
第12回:
Practice Test 6 - listening section
Work on Chapter 1 & 2 of textbook

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
